storyInfo:
A mysterious girl named Kjarr opens talks with the Doctor, who Ensia resolves to search for.
Sharp and Aurora are on the verge of a rescue operation when Kjarr brings them instructions from the Doctor.

attributes.content: Lara, you're a lovely one to your family, helping with work the second you're back.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: No, I'm just doing what I should. I'd love to take a good look around too.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Ah, it really does change once you study outside. Far better head on you than my little brother.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: What a wonderful girl you are. Shame.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: Who knows if I'll ever find one as nice as you again after I move.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: Wait, Sasa, you've been living fine here all this time, right? Why the move?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: My dad, you know. Yesterday at the Tri-Clan Council, they announced the Saintess would lead the three, right?
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: Now Dad's all fired up.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: Oh... Uncle Zoer was always against Sir Enciodes's open door policy...
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Right? We all moved here from up north back then so my brother and I could get work.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: And here, Dad pretty much got used to it, over the years.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: And now they announce the resignation yesterday, and he's over the moons.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: At dinner last night, he was going on and on, mad at Sir Enciodes for everything he'd done these years, and I was fed up hearing it. I even had an argument with him.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: But you can't change his mind in the end. We might end up moving straight back to the Paleroches' territory.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: So what about your brother's job?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Who knows? Once the resignation's through, it's up in the air if Turicum can still do business like before.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: I heard the Paleroches say. See, in the first place, it was the Saintess last Council who wanted Sir Enciodes handing the valleys and mines over.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: If she's going to govern Kjerag, Sir Enciodes probably isn't getting any favors.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: That's true.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: It's a good thing too, though.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: You might've missed it, being outside so long, but the three clans got along fine at first. It's just lately, they've fallen out more and more with each other.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: A lot of people were scared, after last Council, we'd get into a full-blown war.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: Yeah, it's amazing how Sir Enciodes yielded on this. And he's putting power with the Saintess.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Yeah. Just, it should've happened long ago, if you ask me. I don't hate his open door policy, seeing as our family made a good living from it too.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: But sometimes it really does feel like the old people say, how Kjerag's not like Kjerag anymore.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: Him deciding to give way now and make less of a fuss, everyone approves of that.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: It's just old grumps like your big brother against it.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: My brother...
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I'm back.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Oh, you silly kid. Told you to relax once you got home, but you just had to work.
attributes.name: Aurora's Sister

attributes.content: (Softly) You and your ore-pathy thing. You might not feel bad about your health, but we still hurt over it.
attributes.name: Aurora's Sister

attributes.content: It's alright, Sis. A bit of work like this won't get in the way.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Um, where's Bro?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: He said he was heading to the factory just now, and went out all in a hurry. Said he wouldn't be back today, either.
attributes.name: Aurora's Sister

attributes.content: The factory?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Is that the Captain?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Captain, is something up?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Vacation's over, Aurora.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: The Doctor got nabbed at the station by the Paleroche family yesterday.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Doctor went with them, voluntarily. You should get what I mean. Likely some sort of plan ticking under that hood.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I took a rough look at the map. Takes some time from the station to the Paleroches'.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: The Doctor should've gotten there by now, and we ought to be on our way.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I'm using the pretext to head to yours now to check the situation, then I'll come out and converge with you.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I guess I'll go rendezvous with the Captain, then.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I see. So you're the one from Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.options: So you don't recognize me.;You didn't pick me out on purpose.

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: You're very unique, but I don't know why it is you're so unique.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.options: Back at the market, what did you mean?

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: It was no more than a word of advice.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: You see? Aren't you under the watch of a group of strangers, unfree to even stroll outside?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Before I answer your question, tell me first. For what reason did you come to Kjerag?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.options: Partnership with Karlan Trade.;To help Cliffheart make up with her siblings.;Sightseeing.

attributes.content: So in other words, you're Enciodes's friend?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Mending the three Silverashes' relations?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: You speak some hefty words.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Then your luck is tragic, being drawn into a mess like this without rhyme or reason.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Yet it's beyond me, believing someone who can be so carefree in these circumstances is truly here on a tourist's plan.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: I'm very curious—how outsiders like you regard this land of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.options: It's very peaceful here.;The people here are faithful.;Backwards.

attributes.content: Peaceful... yes, it's been peaceful here for over a thousand years by now.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: And peace of mind signifies stagnation.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Kjerag's people are too used to this status quo, to the point they don't care what happens outside, nor have any interest in it.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: It should be a good thing by all rights, but lately, I've felt... *sigh*...
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: In the end, their belief in Kjeragandr is the root of what condenses the people in this land together.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: But at times, I've felt the people are somewhat too dependent on belief.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Can you sympathize? You tell every worry you have to the divine, hoping they'll come to help solve things, and so you turn—
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Though, so clearly, you should use your own willpower to change circumstances, you just take divine will as an excuse to stagnate.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Though, so clearly, you till by your own hands to gain your harvest, you still thank the divine for their generosity after the fact.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Though, so clearly, making the choices, putting in the effort, should be for each person's own...
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: You're very forthcoming.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: But most people like you, outsiders... in modern terms, 'foreigners,' hold such a view.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: The people outside long since developed plenty to grant them idleness, or in other words, labor-saving technology.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: They're accustomed to a convenient life, while most Kjerag folk have never heard of such things.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Maybe the people of Kjerag really can forge diligence and courage out of a harder life, can learn of belief and virtue in an environment far from all the pleasures.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: But I also don't feel it should continue for eternity.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: The people of Kjerag broke ground on a haven between these snowy mounts, but can they preserve their homeland's solidity and stability forever on tradition alone?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: The way you see it, should Kjerag change?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.options: It needs to.;You can't generalize this issue.;I don't know this place well enough yet.

attributes.content: Ah, so you think so too?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Anyone with a sharp eye could tell, honestly, that the transformation Enciodes brought can't be stopped.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Who can so easily decline their own life becoming a little less heavy, a little more convenient?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: And here I thought you'd say, everything backwards here should be changed.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: I've heard countless people say things like yours already.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: And those people, by and large, are those born and raised in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: How cautious.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: But I don't mind the cautious at all.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: It's just a shame. You probably have little time left to learn how this present country manifests.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: I have a friend.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: This friend has been thinking, all this time, about how to finally change Kjerag for the better.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: However, she's thought for a long time, and can't come up with an answer.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: She's gradually realized that everyone thinks different to her, and their mindsets, no matter who they are, all disturb her.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: She wants to do something, but every time she wants to, there's always someone advising against her.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: And now, she finds, she's become slowly unable to stop what those people wish to do.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: And it's in this moment you've arrived.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.options: You think this is a sort of omen?

attributes.content: Omen? Perhaps any port in a storm is a more fitting description.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: An invitee of Enciodes, come from outer lands. The spectrum and scent of you give me an otherly feeling, peculiar and novel—
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Tell me, stranger, what does your arrival portend?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.options: Come to mention it, maybe you can do me a favor.

attributes.text: Ensia,\nI hope this letter finds you well. I hear you've come back to Kjerag. I'm very, very happy for that.
Though I can't descend the mountain to meet you, getting word that you were safe and healthy delighted me more than anything.

I also hear that the people helping to treat your Oripathy came to Kjerag with you. If I have the chance, I'd love to express my thanks to them.\nFor saving my sister, they deserve the blessings of Kjeragandr.

Remember to greet your neighbors, and tell them you're sound. Be early to bed and early to wake, and don't forget to pray twice to Kjeragandr every day. Also, you're not allowed to climb any mountains...
Alright, I think you're probably fed up of your sister going on, so I'll stop nagging you here.\nMay you enjoy your time back home, Ensia.
I'll pray before Kjeragandr for blessings upon you.\nP.S. If you can write a letter back to me, that'll be all the better.

attributes.content: Come on, I only got her last letter not long ago. Seriously, it's like she hasn't written in forever. She's on my case like this every time.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Thank you, Kjarr. You're always the one handing me my sister's letters.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It's alright. The Great Saintess can't descend at will, so I go out and about in her place, and bring back outside news to her. It's as she desires, too.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Sorry, though, I've got no room to write a letter back for now. I'm about to get ready for something else.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Based on the bag next to you... you're going to head outdoors?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Where are you going? To climb Jungfrau?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Come on, I forgot until you mentioned it! I still haven't conquered Jungfrau!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But where I'm going is to the valleys this time.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: The valleys? Aren't they about to be handed over to the Vine-Bear Court? And there're so many factories there, too. What are you going to do?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: The Doctor's gonna head there, which means I have someone to see. Oh, Kjarr, you have no idea who I'm talking about, do you?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ah, I do believe I've heard tell. The guest taken away by the Paleroches?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Mm-hm. My guest in the first place, concern for the Doctor's safety is really weighing on me.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You're such a good girl.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: But take care. I hear things haven't been too calm there lately.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Lady Ensia, we can depart now.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Worry not. All responsibility will lie with me on this departure.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: You're a huge help, Uncle.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It's rare you ask me to help you with things. How would I ever refuse this?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Kjarr, I might be gone for a little long while. If you can, go back and tell my sister I'll reply to her after I'm done.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It's quite alright, I can wait.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Aurora, I need info to make judgment calls, especially your views as a local. Tell me how you see the Doctor's current situation.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Gnosis was likely in a very sensitive position, given he was formerly in charge of the mines and valleys.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes putting the Doctor in that same position now is bound to draw Arctosz's attention.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Tell me in detail about why the mines and valleys are such a sensitive area.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Hmm... it'd be more convenient if we had a map on hand.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Kjerag's topography isn't too complicated, and it's not very finely partitioned either.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Usually, us locals just call each area the mines, valleys, woodlands, lakes, mountains, creeks, and plains.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: The creeks and plains, and most of the lakes, are the Paleroches' in the north.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: The Browntails in the west are mainly the woodlands, and the minority of the lakes.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: The Silverashes are mainly the mountains, valleys and mines. They have so little of the lakes, you can essentially ignore it.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: And the valleys and mines... actually, they represent nearly half of the Silverashes' territory already.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Between them, the mines have always been incredibly important land to the Silverashes, because practically all the ore used in Kjerag comes from there.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: While the valleys were only developed in recent years.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Originally, they were extremely poor land to work, and there weren't more than a few hamlets. People always considered it an area with no use.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: But after Sir Enciodes founded Karlan Trade, he chose that land to use for siting factories.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: The majority of Karlan Trade's manufacturing is built there, and it's extremely close to Mount Karlan, too.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: On top of that, I exchanged some info with Kjerag merchants before we left—but everyone who comes outside to do business is related to Karlan Trade in some way.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: A month ago, with the Great Saintess's backing, the Browntails and Paleroches requested and organized a team to investigate health and safety issues at the factories.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: But the team met a surprise attack secretly ordered by Gnosis, who wouldn't play along at all. I don't know how that info came out, but everyone believes Gnosis was involved in it.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: That led to the Paleroches' head, Arctosz, getting inspiration from the Vine-Bear Court to send troops to station in the valleys, and it's because of the consequences of Gnosis's extreme actions that he was finally removed.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: At the meeting, the Doctor mentioned Enciodes's reason for making the invitation.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: We do help construct Oripathy-related facilities for Karlan Trade, but he never mentioned having the Doctor manage anything in his place before.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Which is to say, the Doctor's actively climbed onto the scales of this conspiracy. Very Doctor-like to do.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: That seems likely, but Karlan Trade and Rhodes Island have a perfectly fine relationship, and the Doctor would probably only accept because of that relationship.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: For now, I can't imagine the reason why Sir Enciodes would want to set up the Doctor...
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: What do we do now? Contact Dr. Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: The landship's headed for Victoria. We'd need the use of a local large-scale comms station, because our handheld equipment's got no way to get in touch.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: (Breathes a long sigh)
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Captain...?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I surveyed for a stretch. Guard force at the Doctor's present placement is low-strength.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: The Paleroche residence should have about two hundred in guards, training and arms not up to outside army standard. We can break through on a surprise raid.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I've checked surrounding terrain too. Alternate plan is we infiltrate, but that needs setting up explosives in multiple locations beforehand.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Going in and pulling out both need manufactured explosions to draw attention. There're some points in the wall structure that'll let...
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Wait! Captain!
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I feel like... things aren't going to get to that point.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: No matter what happens, we need to ensure the Doctor's safety. That's our first priority.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: ...I agree with that, but...
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: If we bring force against the house of Paleroche in the run-up to the Grand Ceremony, then I'm worried Rhodes Island will end up an enemy of Mount Karlan.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: What will the Kjerag operators at Rhodes Island do?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I need to consider the worst-case scenario, and the least honorable way of solving things. The present outlook is pessimistic, and if I have to make a choice, you know I'll only choose the Doctor.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: We all hope things won't go that far, but you know as well as I that it doesn't depend on us, and I have a responsibility to the Doctor and Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I just can't shake the sense that... Sir Enciodes probably has his own plans.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: The Doctor chose to play them at their own game, so some kind of clue must've been there long ago, and the Doctor's already prepped to deal with it...
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I've never doubted the Doctor's abilities for a moment. I believe.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: But I need to make my own preparations beforehand. The Doctor put me on standby, so there's a place for us in the plan.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: We need to get in touch with the Doctor first.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Aurora.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: You respect Enciodes a lot.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Yes... Without him, I would've never been able to leave Kjerag, and come into contact with the outside world.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Understandable.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: But for the moment, I want you to forget that. Starting now, you treat him as a hypothetical enemy. Can you do that?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: If you feel like you can't, you can head back right now. I won't blame you.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: But at the same time, I'm an employee of Rhodes Island too.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Remember what you've just said.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: But... do we have to watch out for Cliffheart and the rest too?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I trust Cliffheart, but have no confidence in Ensia Silverash.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: For now. We figure how to meet up with the Doctor.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: You're the Doctor's subordinates?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: ...(Slash)
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: In an instant, a hardened steel blade streaks through air, stopping just a hair's width from the woman's neck.
Wow, that's a rare way to use a sword here.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Well, there's no need to be this ferocious to an ordinary girl you've just met.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Pinning this position, and cracking a joke in this context? Does that make you an ordinary girl?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Put the blade down first! Your Rhodes Island Doctor sent me.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I was asked to bring you a message.
attributes.name: Kjarr
